summary.span: 控制在传输地址上建立或接受连接的权利。

span.span: Controls rights to make or accept connections on a transport address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例控制接受连接或启动 连接的权限。 instances control permission to accept connections or initiate connections. 可以为主机名或 IP 地址、端口号和传输协议建立 权限。A permission can be established for a host name or IP address, a port number, and a transport protocol. > [!NOTE] > 避免使用主机名创建套接字权限，因为这些名称必须解析为 IP 地址，这可能会阻止堆栈。Avoid creating socket permissions using host names, as these names have to be resolved to IP addresses, and this might block the stack. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类设置、更改和强制实施各种套接字访问限制。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to set, change, and enforce various socket access restrictions. [!code-cpp[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果创建的 实例的 `Unrestricted` 值来自 ，则 实例将传递所有需求。If the instance is created with the `Unrestricted` value from then the instance passes all demands. `state` 的任何其他值将导致 实例无法满足所有要求，除非添加了 的传输地址权限。Any other value for `state` results in a instance that fails all demands unless a transport address permission is added with . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 枚举值创建 。The following example creates a using a enumerated value. [!code-cpp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CPP/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CS/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/VB/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 用指定的权限初始化给定传输地址的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the given transport address with the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个 ，该使用指定的 `transport`控制对指定 `hostName` 和 `portNumber` 的访问。This constructor creates a that controls access to the specified `hostName` and `portNumber` using the specified `transport`. `hostName` 可以是 DNS 名称、IP 地址或指定的 IP 子网，例如 192.168.1. \*。The `hostName` can be a DNS name, an IP address, or a specified IP subnet, such as 192.168.1.\*. `portNumber` 可以是传输定义的任何有效端口号，也可以是 。The `portNumber` can be any valid port number defined by the transport, or . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 枚举值、 枚举值、主机名和端口号创建 。The following example creates a using a enumerated value, a enumerated value, the hostname, and the port number. [!code-cpp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CPP/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CS/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/VB/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回两个 实例的逻辑交集。

span.span: Returns the logical intersection between two instances.

returns.span: 表示两个 实例的交集的 实例。

span.span: The instance that represents the intersection of two instances.

returns.span: 如果该交集为空，则该方法返回 。

span.span: If the intersection is empty, the method returns .

returns.span: 如果 参数为空引用，则该方法返回 。

span.span: If the parameter is a null reference, the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是一个权限，该权限可帮助保护由这两个权限保护的资源和操作。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that helps to protect the resources and operations protected by both permissions. 具体而言，它表示最小权限，以使同时通过这两个权限的任何需求也会传递其交集。Specifically, it represents the minimum permission such that any demand that passes both permissions also passes their intersection. 此方法将重写 ，并实现以支持 接口。This method overrides and is implemented to support the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来获取两个 实例之间的逻辑交集。The following example uses the method to obtain a logical intersection between two instances. summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果 为 ，而且当前实例没有定义权限，则此方法返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the current instance defines no permissions; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果 不为 ，而且当前实例定义了 权限的子集，则该方法返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: If is not , this method returns if the current instance defines a subset of permissions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定的一组操作完全包含在指定权限中，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对192.168.1.1：80的访问权限的权限是表示对192.168.1.1： Any 的访问权限的一个子集。For example, a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:80 is a subset of a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:Any. 如果此方法返回 `true`，则当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限比指定权限更多。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来确定一个 是否为另一个的子集。The following example uses the method to determine if one is the subset of another. [!code-cpp[SocketPermissionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SocketPermissionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SocketPermissionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 的结果是一个权限，该权限表示对当前实例所表示的 连接的所有访问，以及由 `target`表示的访问。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all of the access to connections represented by the current instance as well as the access represented by `target`. 通过当前实例或 `target` 传递其联合的任何需求。Any demand that passes either the current instance or `target` passes their union. 此方法将重写 ，并实现以支持 接口。This method overrides and is implemented to support the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法返回两个现有 实例的逻辑并集。The following example uses the method to return the logical union of two existing instances.
